doc:
George Ortuzar https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/George_Ortuzar 0 George Ortuzar (born August 14, 1961), also known as George O, is a Cuban American actor, comedian, and television host best known for his work on Univision, including hosting the shows Lente Loco, La Piñata Loca, and Giorgiomania. Ortuzar has also appeared in several films and commercials, and was featured in advertisements promoting the Hollywood Park Racetrack, for which he served as the marketing manager during its last 12 years of operation. Since 2015, he has hosted the online sports show Better Sports News on YouTube. George_Ortuzar ( born August_14_,_1961 ) , also_known as George_O , is a_Cuban_American_actor , comedian , and television_host best_known for his_work on Univision , including hosting the_shows_Lente_Loco , La_Piñata_Loca , and Giorgiomania . Ortuzar has_also_appeared in several_films_and_commercials , and was_featured in advertisements promoting the_Hollywood_Park_Racetrack , for which he served as the_marketing_manager during its_last_12_years of operation . Since 2015 , he has_hosted the_online_sports show Better_Sports_News on YouTube .
